issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

content.text: Getting this error on SEMrush on testimonials page i.e.
https://www.virtualemployee.com/testimonials
Hi
, Please check the error snapshot below, we are getting this error on testimonials page. Please fix it.
On desktop, the largest contentful paint getting loaded in 24.7 seconds, that huge…

The Testimonial page is entirely video-based. JavaScript is also used in the banner. To minimize the size, we've already implemented a placeholder image. While I'll work on further optimization, there's some uncertainty around how much improvement can be made due to the presence of the videos.
This is expected due to the videos. A video-based website typically impacts the Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) time.

You can verify this by checking other video-based websites as well — for example, platforms like YouTube or Vimeo also experience higher LCP times due to video content. Still, I will try to improve the performance where possible.
Noted,
. Since the videos are necessary for the page design, please proceed with feasible optimizations around loading and rendering.
Let’s ensure we achieve whatever improvement is possible within those constraints. Please update once implemented.
